channel.title: Ain't It Cool News
channel.description: Ain't It Cool News is a Harry Knowles production bringing you the latest in movie, TV, comic and other coolness that's got Hollywood's panties in a bunch.
channel.generator: Doc Falkens Home-Brew Script. doc at aintitcool.com
channel.feedburner:browserFriendly: This is an XML content feed. It is intended to be viewed in a newsreader or syndicated to another site, subject to copyright and fair use.
